title: Best of the Program | Guests: James Lindsay & Chad Prather | 2/17/22
description:
Author James Lindsay joins to discuss his new book, “Race Marxism: The Truth About Critical Race Theory and Praxis," and the Great Reset. BlazeTV’s Chad Prather joins Glenn to discuss his Texas gubernatorial run and what’s happening in Canada.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
